hjb.msg.codec
Interface TypedValueCodec

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseValueCodec
public interface TypedValueCodec

TypedValueCodec declares methods used to assist translation between the typed property/header/attribute values in JMS Messages and their encoded string versions in HJBMessages.

Author:
Tim Emiola

Method Summary
 Object decode(String value)
          Decodes value as if it was of the type corresponding to this TypedValueCodec.
 String encode(Object value)
          Encodes value.
 boolean isEncoded(String value)
          Checks whether a value is an encoded form corresponding to this TypedValueCodec.
 

Method Detail

isEncoded

public boolean isEncoded(String value)
Checks whether a value is an encoded form corresponding to this TypedValueCodec.

Parameters:
value - the value being tested
Returns:
true if value is the encoded form corresponding to the type of this TypePropertyConverter

decode

public Object decode(String value)
              throws HJBException
Decodes value as if it was of the type corresponding to this TypedValueCodec.

Parameters:
value - the value to be decoded.
Throws:
HJBException - if value cannot be decoded by this TypedValueCodec.

encode

public String encode(Object value)
              throws HJBException
Encodes value.

Parameters:
value - the value to be encode.
Returns:
the result of applying this TypePropertyCodec's encoding to value
Throws:
HJBException - if value cannot be encoded by this TypedValueCodec
